name: Seven Slash - Divided
description:
Hey! We are 7Slash, and this is our entry to the 2018 Spring #ue4jam. The game is about the cooperation of the mind and the spirit. The player has to transform between this two state and solve various, creative puzzles. Meanwhile, an evildoer spirit don't want them to escape, and will do everything to catch them. GG

Everything: models, particlefx, voiceover, sounds and music made by during the jam and for this game especially.

How to play:

Your goal is to collect your memories and bring them back to the altar.

Known ISSUES (Keep in mind if you play with this, unfortunatly this bugs not appaered when we did testing :(

  • Puzzle Randomizer sometimes create unsolvable puzzle (Sorry for this)! Workaround: Puzzle is not important in term of the gameplay. You can play and complete the game without solving puzzle.
  • Some DOORS won't open! Workaround:Clues which open more then one door sometimes not open all of them. Don't worry! If clue open one door thats close enough.. :D
  • Sometimes you can stuck between enviromnent and TRAPS! Workaround: Not a common bug, but if happen.. you will die anyway and you need restart the level :'(
